1491190.name: Survival RPG 3: Lost in Time
1491190.description:
What happened? Are you lost? What does "wrong time" mean, you may ask? Sorry, but you have to figure it out for yourself! We present to you the third game in the Survival RPG series - Survival RPG 3: Lost in time. Fight dinosaurs and dragons across times and eras. Find out what's happening on the timeline.

THE ADVENTURE JUST BEGINS

Survival RPG 3: Lost In Time is an RPG adventure game where you will plunge into an exciting challenge as you travel through time and eras. 7 new story chapters are waiting for you, saturated with the juice of the past and the future. Take part in battles against dragons, dinosaurs and other creatures!

TIME

In the game, you can immerse yourself in three different dimensions, full of mysteries and secrets: the Jurassic Period, the Middle Ages and the world of an Alternative Future. Explore over 50 damp dungeons, dark caves, mysterious castles and cities. Your curiosity will become the source of strange events taking place on the timeline.

INTERACTION

On this challenging journey, significant attention is paid to role-playing characters who will immerse you in the story of a lost hero who challenged time itself. Do not neglect them, because in difficult times it is they who will show you the right path.

ITEMS

Loot and craft over 220 items using your findings. During the adventure, you will discover 85 recipes for creating unique products that will greatly facilitate your progress in the game. Be careful, because you might not notice something rare and interesting!

FULL LIST OF FEATURES

- 7 story chapters that will teleport you through time.
- Exploration of more than 50 dungeons, caverns, towns and houses.
- More than 220 items to gather, mine and craft.
- Multiple roleplay quests and characters to help you in your journey.
- 85 crafting recipes that you will unlock during your adventure and exploration.
- Craft tools to help you.
- Discover hidden items.
- Find hidden treasures with treasure maps.
- Fight over 40 different kinds of monsters including dinosaurs and dragons.
- Explore and solve multiple puzzles.
- Explore 3 different eras and timelines: Future, Medieval and Jurassic.
1491190.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 日语*, 韩语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 泰语*, 繁体中文*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
